document_data.name: Horgardin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Horgardin''' was a group of wanderers who served [[Ibrandul]], the Lord of the Dry Depths.
document_data.Organization: The group was composed of various races and led by a [[half-drow]] [[druid]] of Ibrandul. The gray druid lead the group through ancient tunnels believed to have been carved by a [[horgar]].
